mapper.select: SELECT empno,date, chkin, chkout, attend_note FROM team_db.attendance WHERE empno = #{empno} AND date_format(date, '%Y%m') = concat(#{year},#{month}) ORDER BY date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance (empno, date, chkin, chkout, attend_status, attend_note) VALUES (#{empno}, DATE(NOW()), TIME(NOW()), NULL, #{status}, #{note})
mapper.select: SELECT attend_status FROM team_db.attendance where empno = #{empno} AND date = DATE(NOW()) AND chkout is null
